name: sap.watt.uitools.plugin.ui5template.service.SmartTemplateHelper
description: The Smart Template Helper service interface

getAllExtensionPoints.description: Returns all available extension points of the given smart template name

returns.description: extension points array of the given template

getFacetsPerEntitySet.description: Returns all Facets of the given entity sets under the handler file document

params.name: oDocument
params.description: a given document object from a project

writeToI18n.description: Writes to i18n all entries that in the given entity array

params.name: oDocument
params.description: a given document object from a project

getEntitySets.description: Returns all entity sets of the given smart template name under the handler file document

params.name: oDocument
params.description: a given document object from a project

returns.description: entity sets of the given smart template name under the handler file document

createNewControllerExtensionEntry.description: Creates new controllerExtensions entry by given View and Controller names under the handler file document

params.name: oDocument
params.description: a given document object from a project

params.name: bOverwrite
params.description: set true to overwrite controller extensions entry

createNewViewExtensionEntry.description: Creates new viewExtensions entry under the handler file document

params.name: oDocument
params.description: a given document object from a project

params.name: bOverwrite
params.description: set true to overwrite controller extensions entry

validateOnSelection.description: Validates if template exist under pages according to given document and the project and template name

params.name: oDocument
params.description: a given document object from a project

returns.description: true if template exist under pages
